Definition in file N_Zdp.h.

Typedef Documentation

typedef uint8_t N_Zdp_Status_t

ZDP status values. See section 2.4.5 of the ZigBee 2007 specification

Definition at line 48 of file N_Zdp.h.

typedef struct N_Zdp_BindingTableEntry_t N_Zdp_BindingTableEntry_t

Structure containing one binding table entry from a Mgmt_Bind_rsp command.

typedef struct N_Zdp_MgmtBindRsp_t N_Zdp_MgmtBindRsp_t

Structure containing a received Mgmt_Bind_rsp command.

typedef struct N_Zdp_EDScanConfirm_t N_Zdp_EDScanConfirm_t

Result of energy detection scan.

Function Documentation

void N_Zdp_Server_SubscribeForMgmtNwkUpdateReq ( pfReceivedMgmtNwkUpdateReq_t  callback)

Subscribe a function that will be called when a Mgmt_NWK_Update_req command is received, see ZigBee 2007 Specification 2.4.3.3.9. Only used internally.

void N_Zdp_ClientSubscribe ( const N_Zdp_ClientCallback_t *  pSubscriber)

Subscribes for N_Zdp responses.

Parameters:
pSubscriberThe subscriber

Subscribes for N_Zdp responses.

Parameters:
pSubscriberThe subscriber
N_Address_t* N_Zdp_GetSourceAddress ( void  )

Get the source address of the received ZDP message.

Returns:
The source address
Note:
Only use from a ZDP callback function, otherwise the result is undefined.

Send DeviceAnnounce.

uint8_t N_Zdp_SendNwkAddrReq ( N_Address_Extended_t *  pIeeeAddress,
N_Address_t *  pDestinationAddress 
)

Send NWK_addr_req, see ZigBee 2007 specification 2.4.3.1.1.

Parameters:
pIeeeAddressIEEE address to request
pDestinationAddressThe address to send the command to
Returns:
The sequence number of the sent command, this can be used to match a received response with the request
Note:
Only the single request type is supported.

N_Address_t *  pDestinationAddress

Parameters:
nwkAddressOfInterestnetwork address to request
pDestinationAddressThe address to send the command to
Returns:
The sequence number of the sent command, this can be used to match a received response with the request
Note:
Only the single request type is supported.

uint8_t N_Zdp_SendMatchDescReq ( uint16_t  nwkAddrOfInterest,
uint16_t  profileId,
uint16_t  inClusterId,
N_Address_t *  pDestinationAddress 
)

Send a Match_Desc_req command, see ZigBee 2007 Specification 2.4.3.1.7.

Parameters:
nwkAddrOfInterestNetwork (Short) address to be used for matching
profileIdProfile ID to be used for matching
inClusterIdThe Input ClusterID to be used for matching
pDestinationAddressDestination address for the request.
Returns:
The sequence number of the sent command, this can be used to match a received response with the request
Note:
This Implementation only allows a match with a single input cluster and no output cluster.
uint8_t N_Zdp_SendBindReq ( N_Address_t *  pBindSource,
uint16_t  clusterId,
N_Address_t *  pBindDestination,
N_Address_t *  pDestinationAddress 
)

Send Bind_req.

Parameters:
pBindSourceBinding source IEEE address and endpoint. Address type must be afAddr64Bit.
clusterIdCluster ID to bind.
pBindDestinationBinding destination address. Address type must be afAddr64Bit or afAddrGroup.
pDestinationAddressDestination address of message
Returns:
The sequence number of the sent command, this can be used to match a received response with the request
uint8_t N_Zdp_SendUnbindReq ( N_Address_t *  pBindSource,
uint16_t  clusterId,
N_Address_t *  pBindDestination,
N_Address_t *  pDestinationAddress 
)

Send Unbind_req.

Parameters:
pBindSourceBinding source IEEE address and endpoint. Address type must be afAddr64Bit
clusterIdCluster ID to unbind
pBindDestinationBinding destination address. Address type must be afAddr64Bit or afAddrGroup
pDestinationAddressDestination address of message
Returns:
The sequence number of the sent command, this can be used to match a received response with the request

uint8_t N_Zdp_SendMgmtNwkUpdateReq ( uint32_t  channelMask,
uint8_t  scanDuration,
uint8_t  scanCount,
uint8_t  nwkUpdateId,
uint16_t  nwkManagerAddr,
N_Address_t *  pDestinationAddress 
)

Send Mgmt_NWK_Update_req, see ZigBee 2007 specification 2.4.3.3.9.

Parameters:
channelMaskThe channels to scan
scanDurationScan duration
scanCountNumber of energy scans to be conducted (Not used)
nwkUpdateIdNew network ID
nwkManagerAddrNetwork address of the network manager (Not used)
pDestinationAddressDestination address of message
Returns:
The sequence number of the sent command, this can be used to match a received response with the request

void N_Zdp_SendMgmtNwkUpdateNotify ( uint16_t  totalTransmissions,
uint16_t  transmissionFailures,
uint8_t  transSeq,
N_Zdp_EDScanConfirm_t *  pEDScanConfirm,
N_Address_t *  pDestinationAddress 
)

Send Mgmt_NWK_Update_notify, see ZigBee 2007 specification 2.4.4.3.9.

Parameters:
totalTransmissionsThe number of transmissions reported by the device
transmissionFailuresSum of the total transmission failures reported by the device
transSeqThe sequence number of the message to send
pEDScanConfirmThe Energy Detect Scan Confirm message
pDestinationAddressDestination address of message
uint8_t N_Zdp_SendMgmtLeaveReq ( N_Address_Extended_t  deviceIeeeAddress,
bool  removeChildren,
bool  rejoin,
N_Address_t *  pDestinationAddress 
)

Send Mgmt_Leave_Req, see ZigBee 2007 specificaiton 2.4.3.3.5.

Parameters:
deviceIeeeAddressThe IEEE address of the device to be removed.
removeChildrenIf TRUE the device should also remove its children.
rejoinIf TRUE the device is requested to rejoin the network.
pDestinationAddressDestination address of message
bool N_Zdp_IsZigBeeStandardStatus ( ZDO_Status_t  bcStatus)

Checks if received status is one of ZigBee spec. standard ZDP statuses.

Parameters:
bcStatusBitCloud ZDO status
Returns:
True, if status is ZigBee spec. standard statuses, false - BitCloud-specific one.
